description: Perennial cornflower (Centaurea montana 'Gold Bullion') is a stunning sight to behold! This three-feet tall plant is an excellent choice for any garden, and bears lovely golden-yellow flowers with a velvety sheen that make it a standout amongst its peers. It is easy to care for, blooms for months in the summer, and has a long life, making it a low-maintenance addition to any garden. Its border-edge foliage is eye-catching, adding texture and color to any flower bed. Perfect for any sunny or partially shaded area, perennial cornflower is sure to brighten up your garden with its unique beauty.
